00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: db.php 196 2009-02-19 14:59:47Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief WordPress config file.
00005  * 
00006  * Contains default values for WordPress.
00007  * 
00008  * @file
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  * @see         http://wordpress.org/
00015  */
00016 
00017 /**
00018  * @brief The name of the database for WordPress.
00019  */
00020 if (!defined('DB_NAME')) { define('DB_NAME', 'YOUR_DB_NAME'); }
00021 
00022 /**
00023  * @brief MySQL database username.
00024  */
00025 if (!defined('DB_USER')) { define('DB_USER', BOO_DB_USERNAME); }
00026 
00027 /**
00028  * @brief MySQL database password.
00029  */
00030 if (!defined('DB_PASSWORD')) { define('DB_PASSWORD', BOO_DB_PASSWORD); }
00031 
00032 /**
00033  * @brief MySQL hostname.
00034  */
00035 if (!defined('DB_HOST')) { define('DB_HOST', 'localhost'); }
00036 
00037 /**
00038  * @brief Database charset.
00039  */
00040 if (!defined('DB_CHARSET')) { define('DB_CHARSET', 'utf8'); }
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * @brief Database collate type.
00044  * 
00045  * Leave blank.
00046  */
00047 if (!defined('DB_COLLATE')) { define('DB_COLLATE', ''); }
00048 
00049 /**
00050  * @brief Authentication unique keys.
00051  * 
00052  * Automatically generated. You can change them if you want.
00053  * 
00054  * @link https://api.wordpress.org/secret-key/1.1/ WordPress.org secret-key service
00055  * @since WordPress 2.6.0
00056  */
00057 if (!defined('AUTH_KEY')) { define('AUTH_KEY', hash('sha256', 'AUTH_KEY' . BOO_SECRET)); }
00058 if (!defined('SECURE_AUTH_KEY')) { define('SECURE_AUTH_KEY', hash('sha256', 'SECURE_AUTH_KEY' . BOO_SECRET)); }
00059 if (!defined('LOGGED_IN_KEY')) { define('LOGGED_IN_KEY', hash('sha256', 'LOGGED_IN_KEY' . BOO_SECRET)); }
00060 if (!defined('NONCE_KEY')) { define('NONCE_KEY', hash('sha256', 'NONCE_KEY' . BOO_SECRET)); }
00061 
00062 // WordPress database table prefix
00063 if (!isset($table_prefix)) { $table_prefix = 'wp_'; }
00064 
00065 /**
00066  * @brief WordPress localized language, defaults to English.
00067  */
00068 if (!defined('WPLANG')) { define ('WPLANG', ''); }
00069 
00070 /**
00071  * @biref WordPress absolute path to the Wordpress directory.
00072  */
00073 if (!defined('ABSPATH')) { define('ABSPATH', BOO_APP_DIR . '/www/wordpress/'); }
00074 
00075 /**
00076  * @brief Wordpress debug mode.
00077  */
00078 if (!defined('WP_DEBUG')) { define('WP_DEBUG', BOO_DEBUG); }
00079 
00080 
00081 // sets up WordPress vars and included files
00082 require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-settings.php');
